text: Thanks <@U0138GAM1UN> my JSON files are correctly. Maybe something is blocking the customization. We have one theme child of theme Thrifty but we need another theme based on Thrifty, and we can't have two themes extending Thrifty, so I removed the extends line in theme.json, but this don't let me customize the colors of the page when we create a new website.

<@U073724UWFN> just curious, if you install 3rd party theme, then the new theme allow you to customize it?
Lets say this theme <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme/releases/download/v1.11.0/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme.zip>

yes, the other theme that we have, and with the line "extends" : "@marketplace/Juice_Tactics_Snacks/Thrifty" in the theme.json, when we create a new website, it let us customize colors, fonts,... the fields that we have in the file fields.js. At least with Thrifty we can do it. But if we remove the extends, the option to edit the theme shows blocked.
<@U073724UWFN> do you mind to share `theme.json` ??
and `fields.json` :slightly_smiling_face:
of course
I created a child theme from FreshJuice and it let me customize the theme:
It's because in the theme.json we have the line "extends":"FreshJuice"
yea.. looks like something wrong with fields.json
HS CLI returns error
which error?
hah random qustion which extension you have for `fields` file? `.js` or `.json` ??
js
oh...maybe the problem is that
should be json
and should be JSON so file should be `fields.json`
I will change that and check :wink:
yes, the problem was that! I trusted in the file extension, and the problem was that! Thanks for your help! :pray:

<@U073724UWFN> happy to help, if you don't mind, would you please give a star for my open-source project <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme> ?
You can also use it for free for any future projects :slightly_smiling_face:
of course :slightly_smiling_face:

<@U05EMBFTM46> I hope you solve the issue :slightly_smiling_face:
if you don't mind, would you please give a star for my open-source project <https://github.com/freshjuice-dev/freshjuice-HubSpot-theme> ?
